<tal:block replace="nothing"
 xmlns:tal="http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/tal"
 xmlns:metal="http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/metal"
 xmlns:i18n="http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/i18n"/>
 
 <tal:block define="dummy python: request.RESPONSE.setHeader('Content-Type', 'text/css;; charset=utf-8')"/>
 
 
 html {
 /* XXX width: 85%; work with current layout technic but, background should be changed */
 margin-right: auto;
 margin-left: auto;
 }
 
 /* General Layout.
 ** Layout technic based on http://alistapart.com/articles/holygrail/
 -----------------------------------------------*/
 
 div.content {
 background: #fff;
 border: .1em solid #ccc;
 }
 
 /* Define some constant to make the css flexible without pain */
 <tal:block
 define="unit python: 'px';
 LC_fullwidth python: 200;
 LC_width python: 180;
 LC_padding python: 10;
 CC_padding python: 40;
 RC_fullwidth python: 150;
 RC_width python: 130;
 RC_padding python: 10;
 ">
 form#main_form {
 padding-left: <tal:block replace="python: ('%s%s') % (LC_fullwidth, unit)"/>;
 padding-right: <tal:block replace="python: ('%s%s') % (RC_fullwidth + CC_padding, unit)"/>;
 min-width: <tal:block replace="python: ('%s%s') % (LC_fullwidth + CC_padding, unit)"/>;
 }
 
 form#main_form div#footer,
 form#main_form div#header /* XXX Is header working ?? */
 {
 margin-left: <tal:block replace="python: ('-%s%s') % (LC_fullwidth, unit)"/>;
 margin-right: <tal:block replace="python: ('-%s%s') % (RC_fullwidth + CC_padding, unit)"/>;
 }
 
 form#main_form div.column {
 position: relative;
 float: left;
 }
 
 form#main_form div#main_content {
 padding: 0 20px;
 width: 100%;
 }
 
 form#main_form div#left_column {
 width: <tal:block replace="python: ('%s%s') % (LC_width, unit)"/>;
 padding: 0 <tal:block replace="python: ('%s%s') % (LC_padding, unit)"/>;
 right: <tal:block replace="python: ('%s%s') % (LC_fullwidth + CC_padding, unit)"/>;
 margin-left: -100%;
 }
 
 form#main_form div#right_column {
 width: <tal:block replace="python: ('%s%s') % (RC_width, unit)"/>;
 padding: 0 <tal:block replace="python: ('%s%s') % (RC_padding, unit)"/>;
 margin-right: -100%;
 }
 
 form#main_form div#footer {
 clear: both;
 }
 
 /*** IE Fix ***/
 * html form#main_form div#left_column {
 left: <tal:block replace="python: ('%s%s') % (RC_fullwidth, unit)"/>;
 }
 
 </tal:block>
 
 
 
 <tal:block replace="nothing">
 /* Special layout for search bar group: move it top right */
 form#main_form > div.searchBar {
 position: absolute;
 z-index: 200;
 top: .3em;
 right: 1em; /* Same as "body > form#main_form[padding-right]".
 TODO: use dtml code to make this more flexible.
 */
 width: 28em; /* XXX Must be adapted dynamiccaly to let several web widget be diplayed inline.
 TODO: find the appropriate CSS trick to do hit without pain.
 */
 border: 0;
 }
 div.searchBar > div.field {
 float: right;
 }
 div.searchBar div.field > label {
 display: inherit;
 }
 div.searchBar > div.field > label,
 div.searchBar > div.field > div.input {
 float: left;
 margin: 0 .5em;
 }
 </tal:block>
